name: kr.ac.kangwon.SEED
short_description:
1. System S / W management of Web-based 
- Construction of multilateral cooperation system in space that are spatially separated as a Web-based system
- Cross platform
2. Configuration management of source code and documentation
- Provides an integrated configuration management of source code and documentation using Subversion
-  Support the synchronization of code and documentation for the project on multilateral joint development
- Facilitate the traceability of such changes and amendments
3. Tracking of documents 
4. Test interlocking support
- Verification of the implementation through the test interlock
